hints.content:
The dragon ninja started with $\goldE{70}$ rubber stars.

![A number line is labeled 70 on the right end and extends to the left.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/3fe8878fa2de02c8b3c42de100f5d5a9cab4e674)

To subtract on the number line, we jump to the **left**.

He threw $\maroonD{12}$ rubber stars at the a tree.

![From the right at 70 with minus 12 goes to 58. ](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/fbc38cd3058a6d81b1cf88f3559b08c18f74da70)

$\goldE{70} - \maroonD{12} = 58$

Then he threw $\purpleD{33}$ rubber stars at a target.

![From the right at 70 with minus 12 goes to 58. From 58 minus 33 goes to 25. ](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/6960fd98824b44a691208826058eaae489291e0c)

$58 - \purpleD{33} =25$

Last, he threw $\blueE{22}$ stars in the sky.

![A number line starts at 3 on the left and goes to 70 on the right. From the right at 70 with minus 12 goes to 58. From 58 minus 33 goes to 25. From 25 minus 22 goes to 3.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/f6d146c152d7a30d8a7005a5d71123ac932b66fe)

$25 - \blueE{22} = 3$

Here is the correct number line:

![A number line starts at ? on the left and goes to 70 on the right. From the right at 70 with minus 12 goes to 58. From 58 minus 33 goes to 25. From 25 minus 22 goes to ?.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/0ec8acfd003b8c0415d7192fcd7240d0623771d5)

The dragon ninja had ${3}$ rubber stars left.

question.content:
The dragon ninja had $70$ total rubber stars.  

Then, the dragon ninja threw $12$ stars at a tree, $33$ stars at a target, and $22$ stars into the sky.       

**Which number line shows how to find how many rubber stars the dragon ninja has left?**

[[☃ radio 1]]  


**How many rubber stars does the dragon ninja have now?**  

[[☃ numeric-input 1]] rubber stars

choices.content: ![A number line starts at ? on the left and goes to 100 on the right. From the right at 100 with minus 12 goes to 88. From 88 minus 33 goes to 55. From 55 minus 22 goes to ?.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/e5ce2493c546429bd4276941fd05c6de88ae14c0)

![A number line starts at ? on the left and goes to 70 on the right. From the right at 70 with minus 12 goes to 58. From 58 minus 33 goes to 25. From 25 minus 22 goes to ?.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/0ec8acfd003b8c0415d7192fcd7240d0623771d5)
